solution_line_template: The total number of slices she gave to Joe and Darcy is {joe_darcy_fraction} x {total_slices} = <<{joe_darcy_fraction}*{total_slices}={slices_given_to_joe_darcy}>>{slices_given_to_joe_darcy}.
The total slice she gave to Carl is {carl_fraction} x {total_slices} = <<{carl_fraction}*{total_slices}={slices_given_to_carl}>>{slices_given_to_carl}.

Therefore, the total slices left is {total_slices} - {slices_given_to_joe_darcy} - {slices_given_to_carl} = <<{total_slices}-{slices_given_to_joe_darcy}-{slices_given_to_carl}={slices_left}>>{slices_left}.
